org.hibernate.ogm.type.impl

Class StringDateTypeDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.type.impl.AbstractGenericBasicType<Date>
      • org.hibernate.ogm.type.impl.StringDateTypeDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, GridType, StringRepresentableType<Date>, XmlRepresentableType<Date>

    public class StringDateTypeDescriptor
extends AbstractGenericBasicType<Date>
    For Date objects use a String representation.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto <davide@hibernate.org>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
